pkgmetadata.longdescription: Open Population Capture-Recapture // Functions for the analysis of capture-recapture data from animal populations subject to turnover. The models extend Schwarz and Arnason (1996) DOI:10.2307/2533048 and Borchers and Efford (2008) DOI:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2007.00927.x, and may be non-spatial or spatial. The parameterisation of recruitment is flexible (options include population growth rate and per capita recruitment). Spatially explicit analyses may assume home-range centres are fixed or allow dispersal between sampling sessions.
